name: OOXXOO First Edition Magazine
description:
On the 5th September 2008 OOXXOO published the First Edition of work investigating the subject of Synaesthesia.

32 page full colour magazine.

You can purchase one of the limited few left available here.

name: The Valentine Typewriter
description:
'The Valentine Typewriter by Authorised Sign

This t-shirt is hand printed on quality %100 heavy weight cotton with double stitched seams. Each one is unique in the arrangement of the thrice repeated base design. Available in 3 sizes Small (to fit chest 34-36 ins), Medium (38-40) and Large (42-44).



The Valentine Typewriter was designed for Olivetti in 1969 by Ettore Sottsass and Perry King.  

Produced until 2001 its was described as being ‘for use any place except an office, so as not to remind people of monotonous working hours but rather to keep amateur poets company on quiet Sundays in the country or to provide a highly coloured object on a table in a studio apartment.’ 

The lightweight and low profile red plastic body was a clear departure from early cast iron typewriters. The built in handle and carry case made it the first portable typewriter light enough to carry, an instant hit with the pop-art generation and fashion accessory for It-girls.
